PATIENT_INVOICE.BASE_PRICE_ALTERED: The base price for this line item has been augmented by a price list.
PATIENT_INVOICE.DISTRIBUTION_TYPE_EXPLANATION: This option determines whether the invoice items can be distributed at the pharmacy or if they have already been consumed.

ERRORS.INVALID_NUMBERS: The record contains negative, zero, or invalid numbers
ERRORS.MISSING_SALES_ACCOUNT: The record contains an inventory item missing a sales account.  You cannot make an invoice without a sales account.
ERRORS.NOT_CONFIGURED: The record is missing an inventory item. Please put in an inventory item or remove the row.

PATIENT_INVOICE.DESCRIPTION: Invoice to {{ patientName }} ({{ patientReference }}) for {{ numItems }} items from service {{ serviceName }}. {{ description }}
PATIENT_INVOICE.PREPAYMENT_LINK_DESCRIPTION: [Prepayment] Allocation of previous payments against debtor's invoice.
PATIENT_INVOICE.LABEL_PAID: Invoice has been paid in full
PATIENT_INVOICE.ALERT_CREDITOR_BALANCE: {{ patientName }} has a balance on their account of {{ patientBalance | currency:enterpriseCurrencyId}}.  Their balance will be used to automatically pay this invoice in part or in full.
PATIENT_INVOICE.ALERT_CREDIT_NOTE: You are reversing invoice {{ invoiceReference }} belonging to {{ patientName }} ({{ patientReference }}) with a total value of {{ cost }}. Please ensure the information below is correct. This action is not reversible.
